name: Ratical Rhyder!
description:
Humanity is on the verge of e-RAT-ication.

The "Dark White Blight" has greatly decreased the human population, and it has gotten the underground rat society's attention. 

Take on the role of Rhyder Ryden, an unlikely hero with a very specific set of skills and send out your best medics to help e-rat-icate this epidemic. 

Complete with comic-style cut scenes, original music and voice acting.

Submitted to the Extra Credits Game Jam.

A short game by:
Programming
- Xinran Ma
- Justin McKague

Writing/Animation
- Jessica Zhang

Music/Sound Design
- Carsten Booth

Art
- Keni Xiao

UI
- Benjamin Mora-Davison
